text: So just updated Julia. My project directory has non-empty "Manifest.toml" and "Project.toml" files (including `DataFrames = "a93c6f00-e57d-5684-b7b6-d8193f3e46c0"`). I go to the project directory and `Pkg.activate(".")`  and it gives the message "Activating environment at `...\Project.toml`". But when I attempt to do `using DataFrames` or other packages it gives me the error that the packages are not found. Isn't there a method of auto installing all of the required packages using the `.toml` files? Thanks
